mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_player (member_no,event_no) SELECT (SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}),#{event_no} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM event_player WHERE member_no = (SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}) AND event_no=#{event_no})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM commentview WHERE board_no=#{bno} ORDER BY comment_root,comment_no
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_like = board_like+1 WHERE board_no = #{bno}
UPDATE board SET board_read = board_read+1 WHERE board_no = #{bno}

mapper.select: SELECT q.question_board_no ,(SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_no = q.member_no) AS member_id ,q.question_board_title ,q.question_board_date ,q.question_board_status ,q.question_board_content ,a.answer_board_no ,a.answer_board_title ,a.answer_board_date ,a.answer_board_update ,a.answer_board_content FROM question_board q LEFT JOIN answer_board a ON q.question_board_no = a.question_board_no WHERE (answer_board_no = (SELECT max(answer_board_no) from answer_board WHERE question_board_no = a.question_board_no) or answer_board_no IS NULL) AND q.member_no = (SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id = #{member_id}) ORDER BY question_board_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_board SET question_board_title=#{title}, question_board_content=#{content}, member_no= (SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id})
